description:
The giant children fly into a mysterious rage, and Chopper discovers the true reason for their unusual condition! Meanwhile, Zoro, Brook, and Sanji cross paths with a dangerous duo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chopper`s Fury! The Master`s Inhumane Experiment
La fureur du Chopper. Les expériences inhumaines du maître !
Чоппер в ярости! Бесчеловечные эксперименты Мастера!
チョッパー激怒 M[マスター]非道なる実験
